data.title: How To Choose An Interior Designer
data.subtitle: Interior design is the art or process of designing the interior, often including the exterior, of a room or building.
data.thumb_image_alt: Potted plants, candles on a table
data.excerpt: Interior design is the art or process of designing the interior, often including the exterior, of a room or building. An interior designer is someone who coordinates and manages such projects.

sections.content:
Lets build something great together.
Complete our contact form or send us an email at [email@example.com](mailto:email@example.com). *** ## Our Offices ### San Francisco 1234 Some St.
San Francisco, CA 12345
1-234-556-7890
[Get directions →](https://goo.gl/maps/eh6fn7JjMS4vYs337) ### New York 1234 Some St.
New York, NY 12345
1-234-556-7890
[Get directions →](https://goo.gl/maps/eh6fn7JjMS4vYs337)

form_fields.name: subject
form_fields.label: What services are you looking for?

form_fields.name: consent
form_fields.label: I understand that this form is storing my submitted information so I can be contacted.

sections.title: This is an Award Winning Agency Based in San Francisco and Focusing on Digital, Identity, and Print Design.
sections.content: We are a brand and design practice. We work closely with you, your team to deliver inspiring work, which enables your organization to grow. [Let's talk](/contact/).

sections.title: Clients
sections.subtitle: A few of the companies we're proud to call partners

grid_items.title: Business design
grid_items.content:
- Research and insight
- Business innovation and transformation
- Brand and strategy
- Brand portfolio strategy
- Design strategy
- Digital and experience strategy
- Communication strategy

grid_items.title: Brand design
grid_items.content:
- Brand development
- Naming
- Brand identity
- Design systems
- Concept development
- Brand implementation and management
- Typography

grid_items.title: Experience design
grid_items.content:
- Digital product design
- Service design
- Environmental and retail design
- Packaging design
- Art direction
- Communication design
- Social media
- Product design

Design is knowing which ones to keep. > >— Scott Adams Morbi commodo, ipsum sed pharetra gravida, orci magna rhoncus neque, id pulvinar odio lorem non turpis. Nullam sit amet enim. Suspendisse id velit vitae ligula volutpat condimentum. Aliquam erat volutpat. Sed quis velit. Nulla facilisi. Nulla libero. ## Unordered and Ordered Lists + Donec non tortor in arcu mollis feugiat + Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit + Donec id eros eget quam aliquam gravida + Vivamus convallis urna id felis + Nulla porta tempus sapien *** 1. Donec non tortor in arcu mollis feugiat 2. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit 3. Donec id eros eget quam aliquam gravida 4. Vivamus convallis urna id felis 5. Nulla porta tempus sapien ## Code Blocks Blocks of code are either fenced by lines with three back-ticks, or are indented with four spaces. ``` let sequence = [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13]; for (let i = 0; i < sequence.length; i++) { console.log(sequence[i]); } ``` ## Inline Elements Emphasis, aka italics, with *asterisks* or _underscores_. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with **asterisks** or __underscores__. Combined emphasis with **_asterisks and underscores_**. Strikethrough uses two tildes. ~~Scratch this.~~ Inline `code with back-ticks around` it. This is marked or highlighted text. This is [an example](http://example.com) link. ## Tables
Table with thead, tfoot, and tbody
Header content 1 Header content 2
Body content 1 Body content 2
Footer content 1 Footer content 2

sections.content: Thank you for testing this template. We hope you like it. Have a great day!
